creator: rstoyanchev@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 30612
Patch showing fix

The registerAuthenticatedSession method appears to have a bug. It looks like it's trying to find Set<WsSession> or create it if it is null. But the null check is against the input argument (wsSession) not against set of WsSession's.

See attached patch.

creator: violetagg@apache.org
text: Thanks for the report and the patch. Fix is applied in trunk.
